body: With how good the art is, I really hope the story does something unique, so it can differentiate from the other generic ntr doujins

I know I said I won't be angry with this series anymore. But I want that bitch Michiru to be faced with consequences. I don't want the husband and kid to end up being cluless or worse, depressed, brushes off and wrongfully accepts and forgives what Michiru has done because let's face it, she's a cock hungry whore. She'd fuck anyone, LITERALLY ANYONE. If and IF the author decided for her to get busted or whatever, I really wish that the husband files divorce papers, bring the kid with him, never have contact with her again. The story can end with a year or so time skip, where BITCHIRU makes money off streaming herself getting fucked, heck become a gyaru or something. Too many NTR plots let the bitch get away with whatever she had done, I wish Andoryu is smart enough to end this story with some real consequences. But that's just my not so humble opinion. Then again, this is just another NTR with the same cliche plot. The goat art is what made me stay.
